content.rendered:
Directed by Homi Adajania

Written by Bhavesh Mandalia. Gaurav Shukla. Vinay Chhawal. Sara Bodinar

Cast Irrfan Khan (Champak Bansal). Radhika Madan (Tarika Bansal). Kareena Kapoor (Naina Kohli). Deepak Dobriyal (Gopi Bansal). Dimple Kapadia (Mrs. Sampada Kohli). Ranvir Shorey (Bablu aka Balashankar Tripathi). Pankaj Tripathi (Tony – Travel Agent Dubai). Kiku Sharda (Gajju). Tillotama Shome (Immigration Consultant). Zakir Hussain (Justice Chheda). Meghna Malik (Principal Chheda). Manu Rishi Chadha (Brijesh Goswami). Poorvi Jain (Rashi Bansal). Myrah Dandekar (Anjali). Manish Gandhi (Advait). Kishore Bhatt (Principal Bhatt). Mark Bennington (Officer Steve). Connor Brabyn (Troy). Thai Anh Bui (Wan – Advait’s Korean Friend). Ayesha Ali (Pakistan Cricket Fan). Manoj Anand (Pakistan Cricket Fan). Paolo Bafico (VIP guest charity auction). Azzy Bagria (Teacher (as Bagria Azzy)). Des Barron (London House Landlord). Henry Broom (Supporting Artist). Shahan Chaudhry (Immigration Airport Passenger). Charlotte Dunnico (Auction Guest). Frank Free (Border Officer). Nisha George (Migrant Airport Passenger). Sonia Goswami (Airport Official). Bikramjit Gurm (Sardarji). Chris Martin Hill (Police officer / driver). Pippa Hughes (Jane). Persephone Hulewicz (Officer Alex).Md Anan Islam. Op Jangid (Friend). Peter Jay (Principal Jay). Naveen Jingar (Sonu irrfan’s relative). Elle Jones (Visitor / Parent). Kinjal (Migrant Airport Passenger). Dimple Kumar (Migrant Airport Passenger). John Last (Border Cop). Helen Lauren (Millionaire auction lady). Matt Lavall (Drug Gang Boss (as Matt Scott)). Richie Lawrie (The Bohemian Hippie Leader). Patrick Loh (Tenant). Swaylee Loughnane (Bouncer Henry). Michael Lumb (Pakistan Cricket Fan). Johnny Neal (Jason (credit only)). Umair Patel (Musical Artist (archive sound)). Lokendra Singh Rajpurohit (Jinesh). Sanjana G. Sandhu (Immigration Airport Passenger). Satkeer (Student). Atul Sharma (Lord Mayor of London). Vinita Sharma (Indian Restaurant Diner). Deependra Singh (Deependra). Sunita (In the crowd). Gillian Vassilliou (Supporting Artist). Ren Vassilliou (Supporting Artist). Dave Watts (Pakistan Cricket Fan). Winnie Wong (Tenant). Elliott Wooster (Richard). Rina Yadav (Domestic Abuse Victim). Simon Anthony (Principal (uncredited)). Raj Awasti (Dodgy tyre salesman (uncredited)). Ankit Bisht (Anmol Shekhawat (uncredited)). Dilyana Bouklieva (Paramedic (uncredited)). Dominic Canokema (Airport Passenger (uncredited)). Wong Charlie (Casino Gambler (uncredited)). Soheila Clifford (Madison (uncredited)). Tiziana Coste (VIP Guest (uncredited)). Daniel Eghan (Millionaire auction Lord (uncredited)). John Glynn (Mike. Naina’s Colleague (uncredited)). John Harpley (Student / Party Guest (uncredited)). Lee Nicholas Harris (Police sergeant (uncredited)). Nathan Haymer-Bates (Bouncer (uncredited)). Debra Hensman (Airport Passenger (uncredited)). Preeti Malhotra (Customer (uncredited)). Bharat Mistri (Street Resident (uncredited)). Iago Montgomery-Jarvis (Security (uncredited)). Kuldeep N.(Migrant Airport Passenger (uncredited)). Jamie Neagle (Bouncer (uncredited)). Serena Orsi-Dadomo (Isabella (uncredited)). Lukas Parizek (Russian auction millionaire (uncredited)). Hiten Patel (Pakistan Cricket Fan (uncredited)). Patrizia Petrassi (Auctioneer (uncredited)). Gino Picciano (Business man (uncredited)). Jim Quirke (Police Officer (uncredited)). Jessica Rhodes (Customs officer (uncredited)). Isabella Rosinante (Auction Guest (uncredited)). Andreina Sambucetti (Police officer / driver (uncredited)). Daniela Villada LondoÃ±o (Student / Migrant Airport Passenger (uncredited)). Jason Yip (Casino Gambler (uncredited)). Nisha Zala (Indian Restaurant Diner (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Kishor Athwal. Vishal Bajaj. Surabhi Bhatnagar. Jyoti Deshpande. Smriti Jain. Himanshu Joshi. Hetvi Karia. Sharada Karki. Pratik Nandkumar More. Sudipto Sarkar. Ashok Shetty. Yogiraj Shetty. Sanjay Soni. Siddharth Soni. Dinesh Vijan.

Production Maddock Films.. Skywalk Films. The Crew Rajasthan
